data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Preston with the kick-off.
Ryan Ledson (Preston) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 23, Penalty! Kevin Friend points to the spot, great chance for Preston...
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead thanks to a penalty from Daniel Johnson.
In the minute 46, It's QPR with the kick-off after the break.
The home team replace Dominic Ball with Albert Adomah.
Preston have been awarded a penalty in London...
In the minute 60, Scott Sinclair gives Preston a 0-2 lead from the penalty spot.
QPR make their second substitution with Chris Willock replacing Ilias Chair.
Tom Barkhuizen is replacing Daniel Johnson for the away team.
In the minute 84, The away team have replaced Emil Riis Jakobsen with Sean Maguire. This is the second substitution made today by Alex Neil.
That's full-time at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium. The final score is 0-2.
Jayden Stockley is on a sub for Scott Sinclair for Preston.
